content: ## hello ## this is a written pattern for a mini pvz sunflower doll which is 6 inches / 15cm tall and 3 5 inches / 9cm wide i used a 3 5 mm hook and 4/7 sized yarn to work on this but you can do it with whatever materials you have at hand *materials -yellow yarn petals -light brown yarn face -dark brown yarn dirt -brick colored yarn pot -black yarn face details -green yarn stem and leaves -any kind of stuffing you prefer -embroidery needle or any kind of thick needle which could help you sew/embroider on the mouth and eyes -liquid silicone or any type of glue that can help you glue the leaves to the flower and the dirt to the pot you can t share sell or claim this pattern as yours but you can obviously sell the dolls you make with it and make your own pattern with this as a base credit when making the doll and sharing it online is appreciated
